body:
### Install
```
$ gem install turntabler
```

### Author
Aaron Pfeifer (aaron.pfeifer@gmail.com)

_Contributions from_:

* Alain Gilbert (alain.gilbert.15@gmail.com)

### Download
You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running:

```
$ git clone git://github.com/obrie/turntabler
```

### License
MIT License
name: Turntabler
tagline: An evented Turntable.FM API for Ruby
